thread.title: BRIEF-Chesapeake Energy Says Incurred Total Charge Of About $38 Mln In Current Quarter In Connection With Workforce Reduction Announced In Jan

title: BRIEF-Chesapeake Energy Says Incurred Total Charge Of About $38 Mln In Current Quarter In Connection With Workforce Reduction Announced In Jan

organizations.name: brief-chesapeake energy says incurred total charge of about

text:
Market News May 2, 2018 / 12:53 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Chesapeake Energy Says Incurred Total Charge Of About $38 Mln In Current Quarter In Connection With Workforce Reduction Announced In Jan Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 2 (Reuters) - Chesapeake Energy Corp:
* CHESAPEAKE ENERGY - INCURRED TOTAL CHARGE OF ABOUT $38 MILLION IN CURRENT QUARTER IN CONNECTION WITH WORKFORCE REDUCTION ANNOUNCED IN JANUARY - SEC FILING
* CHESAPEAKE ENERGY SAYS FORECASTED 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES, INCLUSIVE OF CAPITALIZED INTEREST, ARE $2.0 â€“ $2.4 BILLION Source text: [ bit.ly/2I9InMe ] Further company coverage:
